quotes.quote: Dress like you're going to meet your worst enemy today.
Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live.
Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
Fashion should be a form of escapism, and not a form of imprisonment.
Fashion fades, only style remains the same.
Always dress like you're going to see your worst enemies.
It's not about the dress you wear, it's about the life you lead in the dress.
Fashion is about comfort and feeling good
People will stare. Make it worth their while.
Fashion is only the attempt to realize art in living forms and social intercourse.
One is never over-dressed or under-dressed with a Little Black Dress.
Sweatpants are a sign of defeat. You lost control of your life so you bought some sweatpants.
Fashion should be stylish and fun.
People walk differently in high heels. Your body sways to a different kind of tempo.
The dress must follow the body of the woman, not the body following the shape of the dress.
Fashion is part of the daily air and it changes all the time, with all the events. You can even see the approaching of a revolution in clothes. You can see and feel everything in clothes.
Pure, intense emotions. It's not about design. It's about feelings.
Fashion is what you're offered four times a year by designers. And style is what you choose.
Style is wearing an evening dress to McDonald's, wearing heels to play football. It is personality, confidence and seduction.
A woman is never sexier than when she is comfortable in her clothes.
Fashion is part of our culture, and it's about more than just a pretty dress.
Trendy is the last stage before tacky.
Fashion is all about happiness. It's fun. It's important. But it's not medicine.
Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
We don't need fashion to survive, we just desire it so much.
Fashion is a trend. Style lives within a person.
Fashion is very important. It is life-enhancing and, like everything that gives pleasure, it is worth doing well.
Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
Fashion is the armor to survive the reality of everyday life.
Shoes transform your body language and attitude. They lift you physically and emotionally.
Architecture is how the person places herself in the space. Fashion is about how you place the object on the person.
Fashion is an art and you are the canvas.
Fashion is a reflection of the time.
The principle of the design - the harmony, rhythm and balance are all the same with interior and fashion design.
A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way you live.
What you wear is how you present yourself to the world, especially today, when human contacts are so quick. Fashion is instant language.
In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
Give a girl the right shoes and she can conquer the world.
A woman's dress should be a like a barbed-wire fence: serving its purpose without obstructing the view.
Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
Clothes are like a good meal, a good movie, great pieces of music.
You can never take too much care over the choice of your shoes. Too many women think that they are unimportant, but the real proof of an elegant woman is what is on her feet.
The difference between style and fashion is quality.
Fashions fade, style is eternal.
Anyone can get dressed up and glamorous, but it is how people dress in their days off that are the most intriguing.
